name: MindPath
description:
A gamejam Entry! Done in one week. Team of 3! One coder, Main modeler and a sound person! WARNINGS BELOW

Pick your exit, elevator or stairs. There are 8 unique endings! find them all! 

WARNINGS: SOUNDS CAN BE LOUD AND POTENTIALLY UNSETTLING. This game has horror elements. This game contains Bugs(creepy crawly kind), Creepy monsters and more. All SFW but a lil creepy! have fun
